post.title: ME BY CANALI
post.excerpt: You design your wardrobe and personalize every detail.
post.content:
Canali lets you express your distinctive personality for every occasion. Me by Canali redefines the traditional concept of Made to Measure and allows you to craft a full range of formal and casual garments.

From suits, blazers, coats, pants, shirts, and even knitwear, outerwear, leather jackets, and denim, you can select the pattern, fit, and materials of your creations from over 500 fabrics and leathers with guidance from our in-house specialists. You can then customize these elements into numerous pieces. Your personal selections will be crafted for you entirely in Italy and made to represent your unique style.

We look forward to welcoming you​​​

One of our specialists will be at your disposal to present our new selection of Spring Summer fabrics and the new Me by Canali personalization service, offering a customized consultation at our boutique, at your home or office, or via video call.​​
